verses.text: \w The|strong="H0834"\w* \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Isaias \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Amos \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w saw|strong="H2372"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* Juda \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ozias, Joathan, Achaz, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ezechias, \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* ye \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w give|strong="H0238"\w* \w ear|strong="H0238"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w brought|strong="H7311"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*: \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* despised \w me|strong="H7311"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3045"\w* \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* knoweth \w his|strong="H3045"\w* \w owner|strong="H1167"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* ass \w his|strong="H3045"\w* \w master’s|strong="H1167"\w* crib: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w me|strong="H0995"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w understood|strong="H0995"\w*.

\w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sinful|strong="H2398"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* laden \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7489"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, ungracious \w children|strong="H1121"\w*: \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* forsaken \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w blasphemed|strong="H5006"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* gone \w away|strong="H0268"\w* backwards.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H4100"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w*, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w increase|strong="H3254"\w* transgression? \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w sick|strong="H2483"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* sad.

\w From|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w sole|strong="H3709"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* unto \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w soundness|strong="H4974"\w* therein: \w wounds|strong="H4347"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w bruises|strong="H6482"\w* \w and|strong="H7218"\w* swelling sores: \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w bound|strong="H2280"\w* \w up|strong="H5704"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* dressed, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* fomented \w with|strong="H8081"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*.

\w Your|strong="H0398"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w*, \w your|strong="H0398"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: \w your|strong="H0398"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w* \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w your|strong="H0398"\w* face, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w* \w as|strong="H0776"\w* \w when|strong="H0776"\w* wasted \w by|strong="H0784"\w* enemies.

\w And|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H5341"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* Sion shall \w be|strong="H3754"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w* \w as|strong="H1323"\w* \w a|strong="H3498"\w* covert \w in|strong="H3498"\w* \w a|strong="H3498"\w* \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*, \w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w as|strong="H1323"\w* \w a|strong="H3498"\w* lodge \w in|strong="H3498"\w* \w a|strong="H3498"\w* garden \w of|strong="H1323"\w* cucumbers, \w and|strong="H1323"\w* \w as|strong="H1323"\w* \w a|strong="H3498"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* that \w is|strong="H1323"\w* laid waste.

Except \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w left|strong="H3498"\w* us seed, \w we|strong="H1819"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H1819"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Gomorrha.

\w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, ye \w rulers|strong="H7101"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w*, \w give|strong="H0238"\w* \w ear|strong="H0238"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, ye \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Gomorrha.

\w To|strong="H0559"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* purpose \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w offer|strong="H2077"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* victims, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*? \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w full|strong="H7646"\w*, \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w desire|strong="H2654"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* holocausts \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w fatlings|strong="H4806"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* calves, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* buck \w goats|strong="H6260"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w required|strong="H1245"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* things \w at|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* walk \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* courts?

\w Offer|strong="H7121"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H4503"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w vain|strong="H7723"\w*: \w incense|strong="H7004"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w an|strong="H0935"\w* \w abomination|strong="H8441"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w me|strong="H0935"\w*. \w The|strong="H0935"\w* \w new|strong="H2320"\w* \w moons|strong="H2320"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* other festivals \w I|strong="H3201"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* abide, \w your|strong="H0935"\w* \w assemblies|strong="H4744"\w* \w are|strong="H3808"\w* \w wicked|strong="H0205"\w*.

\w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* hateth \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w new|strong="H2320"\w* \w moons|strong="H2320"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* solemnities: \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H5315"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* troublesome \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w I|strong="H5315"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w weary|strong="H3811"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w bearing|strong="H5375"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w stretch|strong="H6566"\w* \w forth|strong="H8085"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w turn|strong="H1571"\w* \w away|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*.

\w Wash|strong="H7364"\w* \w yourselves|strong="H5869"\w*, \w be|strong="H5869"\w* \w clean|strong="H2135"\w*, \w take|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H5493"\w* \w evil|strong="H7455"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w your|strong="H5493"\w* devices \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w my|strong="H5493"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: \w cease|strong="H2308"\w* \w to|strong="H5869"\w* \w do|strong="H5493"\w* perversely,

\w Learn|strong="H3925"\w* \w to|strong="H3925"\w* \w do|strong="H3190"\w* \w well|strong="H3190"\w*: \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, relieve \w the|strong="H1875"\w* oppressed, \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w for|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H1875"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*, \w defend|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H1875"\w* \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w then|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* accuse \w me|strong="H4994"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w sins|strong="H2399"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w white|strong="H3835"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w snow|strong="H7950"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w red|strong="H0119"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w crimson|strong="H8438"\w*, \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w white|strong="H3835"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w wool|strong="H6785"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H0776"\w* \w willing|strong="H0014"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* hearken \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H0398"\w*, \w you|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w good|strong="H2898"\w* \w things|strong="H2898"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H0518"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* provoke \w me|strong="H0398"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* wrath: \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w*.

\w How|strong="H0349"\w* \w is|strong="H4941"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w* \w city|strong="H7151"\w*, \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w full|strong="H4395"\w* \w of|strong="H4941"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*? \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* dwelt \w in|strong="H0539"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w*, \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w murderers|strong="H7523"\w*.

Thy \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w is|strong="H3701"\w* \w turned|strong="H1961"\w* \w into|strong="H1961"\w* dress: thy wine \w is|strong="H3701"\w* mingled \w with|strong="H1961"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

Thy \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w are|strong="H8199"\w* faithless, \w companions|strong="H2270"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w thieves|strong="H1590"\w*: \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w love|strong="H0157"\w* \w bribes|strong="H7810"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w run|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0413"\w* \w rewards|strong="H8021"\w*. \w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w widow’s|strong="H0490"\w* cometh \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* saith \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w mighty|strong="H0046"\w* \w one|strong="H0046"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w Ah|strong="H1945"\w*! \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* \w myself|strong="H5162"\w* \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* adversaries: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* revenged \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* clean purge \w away|strong="H5493"\w* thy dress, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w take|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w tin|strong="H0913"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H6664"\w* \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* thy \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w were|strong="H7223"\w* \w before|strong="H7223"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* thy counsellors \w as|strong="H3651"\w* \w of|strong="H8199"\w* \w old|strong="H7223"\w*. \w After|strong="H0310"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H0310"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H8199"\w* \w the|strong="H0310"\w* \w just|strong="H6664"\w*, \w a|strong="H7121"\w* \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

Sion shall \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* \w in|strong="H7725"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* they shall \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w her|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w in|strong="H7725"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w destroy|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* wicked, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* forsaken \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w*.
